data.comment: Today's referee, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 2, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Getafe.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Valencia in the half of Getafe.
Getafe have a goal kick.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 8, The match at Mestalla has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gabriel Paulista, who is down injured.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Valencia's Gabriel Paulista looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Getafe at Mestalla.
Throw-in for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 11, In Valencia, Enes Ünal (Getafe) misses the target with a header.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Getafe's area.
In the minute 15, Valencia push upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Valencia are whistled for offside.
In the minute 17, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Getafe throw-in in Valencia's half.
In Valencia, Mathias Olivera of Getafe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
In the minute 19, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Valencia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 22, Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
Yunus Musah scores to make it 1-0 at Mestalla.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 25, Valencia are coming forward and Kang In Lee gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Getafe at Mestalla.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 27, Getafe's Mauro Arambarri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
In the minute 28, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Getafe at Mestalla.
Can Valencia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Hugo Guillamon (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Valencia.
In the minute 34, At Mestalla, Valencia are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Valencia.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 37, Valencia needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Getafe push forward at Mestalla and Nemanja Maksimovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia.
In the minute 39, Daniel Wass gets his shot on target but fails to score for Valencia.
Free kick Getafe.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 41, Gabriel Paulista (Valencia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 45, Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Valencia.
In the minute 45, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Getafe a goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 48, Thierry Correia is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Getafe throw-in in Valencia's half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards the home team a throw-in.
In Valencia, Getafe push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 52, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Getafe's Cucho Hernandez gets in a shot on goal at Mestalla. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Getafe are pushing forward but Cucho Hernandez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
In the minute 54, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Angel Rodriguez is replacing Nemanja Maksimovic for the away team.
Pepe Bordalas is making the team's second substitution at Mestalla with David Timor replacing Allan Nyom.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Denis Cheryshev for Valencia drives towards goal at Mestalla. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Valencia.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Red card in Valencia! Thierry Correia has been shown a second yellow card by Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In Valencia Getafe drive forward through Cucho Hernandez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 58, Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
The home team have replaced Kang In Lee with Uros Racic. This is the first substitution made today by Javi Gracia.
In the minute 60, Enes Ünal (Getafe) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Valencia have a goal kick.
Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Valencia.
In the minute 61, Maxi Gomez (Valencia) has received a first yellow card.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 64, Denis Cheryshev of Valencia gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Getafe at Mestalla.
Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 66, Getafe to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Free kick Valencia.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Valencia have a goal kick.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Yunus Musah is booked for the home team.
In the minute 71, Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mauro Arambarri (Getafe) has received a first yellow card.
Francisco Portillo is replacing Enes Ünal for Getafe at Mestalla.
In the minute 73, Jaime Mata is on a sub for Mathias Olivera for Getafe.
Pepe Bordalas (Getafe) is making a fifth substitution, with Abdoulay Diaby replacing Erick Cabaco.
In the minute 76, In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Denis Cheryshev (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 78, Javi Gracia (Valencia) is making a second substitution, with Lato Toni replacing Denis Cheryshev.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
In Valencia Getafe attack through Angel Rodriguez. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Jorge Figueroa Vazquez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Getafe.
Important block from the Getafe defence as Uros Racic fires in a strike for Valencia.
In the minute 81, Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Lato Toni of Valencia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Daniel Wass (Valencia) has received a yellow card from Jorge Figueroa Vazquez.
In the minute 83, Free kick Getafe.
Getafe advance rapidly upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez blows for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a Getafe throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 87, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Cucho Hernandez.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Valencia push upfield but Jorge Figueroa Vazquez quickly pulls them for offside.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jorge Figueroa Vazquez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe's Cucho Hernandez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Valencia have been given a penalty at Mestalla...
That's full-time at Mestalla. The final score is 2-2.
Damian Suarez is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
The home team replace Yunus Musah with Jason.
Angel Rodriguez puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
Djene (Getafe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
He's off! Damian Suarez is shown a second yellow card.
At Mestalla, Jaime Mata has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Carlos Soler scores from the spot to level the match at 2-2.
